Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. This offer aims to provide you with an opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price while maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
